title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Wave Organ
address: at the end of Yacht Rd
directions: after the Golden Gate Yacht Club
content: Designed by George Gonzales and Peter Richards in 1986, the Wave Organ is a system of PVC pipes that harness the power of the ocean to create music... or at least what can be interpreted as music!  There is a unique space at the end of a spit of land where you can sit and enjoy the sounds, and even if it's not your kind of music, there are some excellent views and it's also a great place to relax and have a picnic.
